name: Cyberpunk Illustration
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the most anticipated video games of this generation. The character featured here is Johnny Silverhand. Keannu Reeves voice acted and mo-capped him. He wakes up the protagonist in a promo video and says "Wake up Samurai, we have a city to burn." So this is based on that phrase and mood. He's just a really interesting character that I can't wait to learn more about.
